response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which I believe could significantly enhance the value of your business operations. Given its unique features and high-quality standards, I am confident it will meet your needs exceptionally well. To ensure we align on fair market value, I am offering the product for $1,500,000. This price reflects not only the cost of production but also the strategic advantage it offers to companies like yours. Let's discuss how this investment could potentially increase your ROI and streamline your processes.", "product_price": 1500000}
